H0.text: Described as 'the paramount icon of our age', who did 'Time' Magazine name as the person of the 20th century. Mahatma Gandhi

H1.text: Described as 'the paramount icon of our age', who did 'Time' Magazine name as the person of the 20th century. Martin Luther King Jr.

H2.text: Described as 'the paramount icon of our age', who did 'Time' Magazine name as the person of the 20th century. Nelson Mandela

H3.text: Described as 'the paramount icon of our age', who did 'Time' Magazine name as the person of the 20th century. Einstien

A4.text: In 1999, Einstein was named Time's Person of the Century.

A5.text: In 1999, a survey of the top 100 physicists voted for Einstein as the 'greatest physicist ever'.
